article.description: — Ricardo Wright registered 16 points and seven rebounds as Marist narrowly beat Niagara 63-61 on Friday.
article.headline: Wright, Sullivan carry Marist over Niagara 63-61
article.linkText: Wright, Sullivan carry Marist over Niagara 63-61
article.story: POUGHKEEPSIE, N.Y. -- — Ricardo Wright registered 16 points and seven rebounds as Marist narrowly beat Niagara 63-61 on Friday. Wright made two free throws with eight seconds left for a five-point lead. Raheim Sullivan added 12 points and seven assists, Braden Bell chipped in 11 points and Jordan Jones had nine rebounds for Marist (6-1, 4-1 Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference), which earned its fourth consecutive win. Marcus Hammond had 17 points for the Purple Eagles (3-4, 2-3). Kobi Nwandu and Nicholas Kratholm each had 11 points. ------ For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP--Top25 ------ This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
